content: crochet these cute **alpine christmas stockings** for a cozy home during the christmas holiday season *this pattern is written in us terms* the pattern of the alpine christmas stocking is available in four sizes jumbo regular small mini **materials** aran 4 medium yarn 5 0 mm h/8 us 6 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn yardage & size** i used **paintbox yarns simply aran** *201 yds/184 m per 100 g* and **stylecraft special aran** *214 yds/196 m per 100 g* in different colors and in the following amounts **jumbo** **size** 22 4 57 cm by 11 28 cm **yardage** 530 yds 485 m **regular** **size** 18 1 46 cm by 8 9 22 5 cm **yardage** 312 yds 285 m **small** **size** 12 6 32 cm by 6 3 16 cm **yardage** 181 yds 165 5 m **mini** **size** 5 9 15 cm by 3 75 9 5 cm **yardage** 41 yds 37 5 m feel free to use any yarn that meets the gauge **gauge** **single_crochet sections** 4 5 rounds in single_crochet in 2 5 cm or 16 sts per 17 row in 4 10 cm **alpine st section** 15 sts per 14 row in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
